evals.prompt: Write a German SEO blog post targeting the keyword 'Webflow Agentur Schweiz' for a Webflow Premium Partner consultancy based in Zurich. Target audience: Swiss SMEs looking to redesign their website. Include FAQ and schema markup.
evals.expected_output: A complete German-language blog post with meta title, meta description, full article content, FAQ section, JSON-LD schema, and optimization checklist.
assertions: Primary keyword 'Webflow Agentur Schweiz' appears in H1
Primary keyword appears in first 100 words
Meta description is under 155 characters
Content uses formal 'Sie' form
FAQ section contains at least 4 Q&A pairs
Each FAQ answer is 40–80 words and self-contained
FAQPage JSON-LD schema is included
Internal link placeholders are present
Optimization checklist is included at the end
Content uses Swiss German conventions (ss instead of ß)

evals.prompt: Write an English SEO service page for 'Webflow Migration Service' targeting companies wanting to switch from WordPress to Webflow. Transactional intent, lead generation CTA, ~800 words.
evals.expected_output: A service landing page with meta data, benefit-led copy, clear CTA, FAQ, Service schema, and optimization checklist.
assertions: Primary keyword 'Webflow Migration' appears in H1
Page has a clear call-to-action
Content is 700–900 words (appropriate for transactional intent)
FAQ section is included
Service schema JSON-LD is provided
Benefits are highlighted (not just features)
Meta description is under 155 characters
Optimization checklist is included

evals.prompt: I have an existing blog post about SEO for Webflow sites. Here's the URL: https://webflow.com/blog/webflow-seo — analyze it and rewrite the intro and FAQ section to better target AI Overviews and featured snippets.
evals.expected_output: An improved intro paragraph (40–60 words answering the query directly) and an improved FAQ section with 4–6 self-contained Q&A pairs, plus AEO improvement notes.
assertions: Intro answers the primary query directly in 40–60 words
FAQ answers are self-contained (understandable without reading the article)
Output includes explanation of AEO improvements made
FAQPage schema suggestion is included
Content improvements are clearly structured and ready to implement
